method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_get_max_fields

returns.comment: Maximum number of fields the #ICalVcardStructured fields can hold.

method.comment: Gets maximum number of fields the #ICalVcardStructured fields can hold.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_set_num_fields
method.comment: Sets how many fields the @self will hold. It can only be less than i_cal_vcard_structured_get_max_fields().

method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_get_num_fields
method.comment: Gets the number of fields used by @self.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_set_field

parameter.name: index
parameter.comment: an index to which set the item

method.comment: Sets the @self @index item to @item. The @index can only be less than i_cal_vcard_structured_get_num_fields(). The @item is copied and overwrites any previously set value at the @index without freeing it.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_dup_field

parameter.name: index
parameter.comment: an index to which set the item

method.comment: Duplicates the @self @index field and returns it. The @index can only be less than i_cal_vcard_structured_get_num_fields(). The returned object holds a copy of the string array. A %NULL is return when the item is not set or when th eindex is out of bounds.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_as_vcard_string

parameter.name: is_param
parameter.comment: whether the @self corresponds to a parameter

method.comment: Converts the @self into its string representation.
